subject: Learning
title: Why the Myth Persists
description: A fast breakdown of Why the Myth Persists for builders.

hook.text: Over 90% of teachers worldwide believe in learning styles. How can so many experts be wrong?

buildup.text: The myth persists because it feels intuitive. You prefer pictures? You must be a visual learner.

discovery.text: Confirmation bias locks it inâ€”we notice when our 'style' works and ignore when it doesn't.

twist.text: Publishers profit from learning-style assessments and tailored materials. Industry fuels the belief.

climax.text: Debunking is slow because admitting the myth means admitting years of wasted effort.

punchline.text: A comfortable myth beats an uncomfortable truth.

quiz.question: Why does the learning styles myth persist?
options: Confirmation bias and commercial interests reinforce it
Only a few teachers believe it
